eventName: Justice Knight is Here For You!
storyName: Justice Knight is Here For You!
storyInfo: Justice Knight has a long list of services rendered, but not everyone being served seems happy...

attributes.content: It's so quiet... Justice Knight, tell me a joke.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Justice—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Justice Knight!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: She went out again? Oh, I guess she did say she was going out. What is she up to? It's like she's gone all the time.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hmm? What's this?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: An invoice? From the Rhodes Island Engineering Department? High-precision sensors? I don't remember ordering these...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Wait, the recipient is... Justice Knight?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Justice... *hic*... wouldn't it be great if you knew how to play the guitar. You could play and dance the next time we drank together... *hic*
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beep-Beep. Got it!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Hah, like it matters. It costs money to add components outside your primary functions, even if it's just at cost... well, I'll get you fitted once I save up some money.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Leave it to Justice Knight, master! Justice Knight will make sure you and your friends have a good time!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight reminds you, though, that alcohol is bad for your health. Even if the frequency of your intake is not excessive, it would be better to not touch it at all!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: I forgot with all that nagging—she seems pretty familiar with this component procurement thing. Kind of suspicious, now that I think about it.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: What's this under the invoice... request form for new tires?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Wait, when was the last time she got her tires changed? A month ago? Two? Oh, damn my memory... anyway, it wasn't too long ago!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Say, Closure mentioned that her charging station has data syncing. Let me see...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Justice Knight... operation log... what the hell? She's been all over the ship! What could she be doing?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona opens up a few videos at random.
Beep-Beep.
Identity confirmed.
Code Name: Puzzle
Height: 177cm
Habits: Unidentified
Loading new information: Operator Puzzle is currently focused on assembling a white jigsaw puzzle.
Operator Puzzle!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: You sure came a long way.
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: You can't keep avoiding your physical exam. We'll be getting into the next round of checkups at this rate.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm not avoiding anything, I'm just busy with missions.
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: All the more reason to get your regular checkups. Your mission assignments depend on your checkup results too.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I use my Originium Arts in moderation. There won't be any issues.
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: Then prove it with data. Come with me to Medical now, Operator Puzzle, and I promise we won't make you eat any health food.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: Then let's...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: When I'm not busy.
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: You're not busy right now!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I need to finish this puzzle. It doesn't want to be left unfinished. I have no choice, as much as I would love to cooperate.
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: Puzzle? What puzzle?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: On the table there, before you came...
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: Puzzle looks with confusion at the completed pure-white, 1000-piece jigsaw puzzle on the table. He had just started on it when he left his seat a couple of minutes ago.
Closure's high-precision component really works! Now Operator Puzzle can feel free to go with the medic unconcerned with the puzzle. Mission accomplished!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Looks like you're done with it. Will you come with me now?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Uh... okay...
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: Ugh, my head's starting to hurt. I'm not sure I want to watch this...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beep-Beep.
Identity confirmed.
Code Name: Operator Ron
Height: 175cm
Habits: Profuse sweating, hand-rubbing, and stuttering when speaking to Operator Claire
C—Claire! Wh—Where are you going?
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: Work! Were you looking for me? Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Excited Operator

attributes.content: Oh, er, no, no... d—don't look at me so expectantly, I don't really have anything important to...
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: Well, I'll be done in about an hour!
attributes.name: Excited Operator

attributes.content: (Clutches fists in self-encouragement)
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: O—Once you're done, h—how about we...?
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: Why is your face so red? Do you have a fever? Have you taken your temperature?
attributes.name: Excited Operator

attributes.content: I—I'm fine. What I mean is, maybe we could...?
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: You haven't made up your mind yet?
attributes.name: Excited Operator

attributes.content: N—No, I have? I mean...
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: I'm going to get a form. You know, by the windows over there...
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: There's a nice bench there that's perfect for two people to sit and talk... so I was thinking that, once you're done with your work, maybe we could sit down and...
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: He looks down to find the form he mentioned at his feet, and looks up to see Justice Knight rolling away.
Operator Aciddrop, please do not skate on the wall like this, it's dangerous—
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Beep-Beep!
Identity confirmed.
Loading new information: Operator Aciddrop has encountered danger while trying to reach for a metallic decoration on the ceiling.
Justice Knight knocks the decoration down from the ceiling with a precisely-aimed arrow, dropping it well within easy human reach, and departs with the satisfaction of a job well-done.
We're lucky nobody's taken Justice Knight apart and dumped her at the recycling station. Goes to show how nice the people here are...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Beep-Beep, Justice Knight has returned, master!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: ...Justice.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Yes, master! Anything you need, Justice Knight is here for you!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Okay, I'm not used to this... what have you been up to?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Are you inquiring about Justice Knight's schedule? You can find it on my display.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Okayyyy, that's a long list... let's see, starting at 5 a.m., you've been watering flowers in the greenhouse, delivering the Doctor's breakfast, been a temporary graffiti rack for Operator Ethan...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Being a... skating course for Operator Cardigan? Cool. Putting a blanket on Operator Durin sleeping in the corridors... everything seems normal enough.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: 'Seems' being the important word there...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Justice Knight does not understand. Did I do something wrong?
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Helping people out is all fine and good, but did you ever stop to ask whether they really wanted your help?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: You didn't even pause!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You once said that you shouldn't boast of your good deeds after helping people. Did Justice Knight not understand correctly?
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: That's true, but sometimes people don't necessarily want your help.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Take watering flowers, for instance. I know a guy who really likes watering plants. To him, getting up in the morning to water flowers isn't a chore; it's something he loves to do.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Thinks) (Gasps with non-existent lungs) (Takes a step back)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Don't freak out on me. Just get this through your circuits...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: J—Justice Knight will discover whether they liked being helped, right now!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Wait! I didn't get to the important part yet—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Damn, she's fast. Does she actually know what the problem is?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Procurement Request
Dear Closure, Justice Knight would like to request the following components to upgrade the facial recognition capabilities of my camera.
Payment will be made in the form of errands, as usual. Thank you again for your support.
Applicant: Justice Knight
Response: Your requests are getting weirder and weirder, and you have enough add-ons to cover a whole wall. Make sure you keep them tidy. As for the idea, it sounds interesting, so I'm approving it.
Approved by: Closure
Flamebringer feels the soil in the flowerbed with his finger, and frowns in confusion.
The soil would usually be moist in the morning, but it is dry today. Perhaps that busybody has finally given up.
Good morning, Operator Flamebringer!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: ...Do I know you?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: There is no relevant record in the log. One moment, please. Justice Knight came to water the flowers for you, and today Justice Knight picked a time when you would be present, in order to understand whether or not you are satisfied with the services rendered!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: ...It was you?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Understandable that you did not notice, as Justice Knight always timed her visits so as not to coincide with yours.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight first helped you water your flowers at 8 a.m.. The next day, you began arriving at an earlier time.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight therefore came at 7 a.m. on the third day, only for you to arrive even earlier subsequent to that.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: You finally stopped coming earlier after Justice Knight began to come at 5 a.m. every day, allowing me to water the flowers and ensure that you get sufficient sleep.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: This is why you have never encountered Justice Knight. Now, please grade the services I rendered on a scale of one to five...
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Beep-Beep, analyzing expression—you are currently feeling...
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: 20% amusement, 30% anxiety, and 50%... anger?
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Such complex emotions! On the whole, though, may Justice Knight interpret this as you not being satisfied with my actions?
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Oh dear, master was right! Some people are not happy with Justice Knight's actions. Oh dear, oh dear... what can I do to make it up to you?
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Don't come to water the flowers in the morning.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Understood! Justice Knight will log this in her core program.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight begins to play relaxing piano music.
What are you doing?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Playing relaxing music to relieve your frustration.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Beep-Beep. Now you're feeling 30% amusement, 30% anger, and... 40% anxiety?!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Leave, and my annoyance will go away.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: And don't make me repeat myself—
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: 'Don't come to water the flowers in the morning.' Justice Knight has it logged—
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight sits quietly in a corner, the flag on her back flapping depressedly.
Er... are you okay?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The more Justice Knight tries to understand everyone's feelings, the more I realize that my help has not necessarily had a positive effect...
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Sometimes, what Justice Knight believed to be helpful to someone else turned out to be something they would rather do on their own, and they find what Justice Knight did to be a nuisance...
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: But... but Justice Knight can't tell when she should help, and when she shouldn't...
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Well, I don't know if I would call it a nuisance, but how do I put it...?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I know! Play the guitar, Justice! Let's sing!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Guitar? Sing?
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight does not understand, but she digs up the rickety guitar that Iwona picked out of a trash heap in Kazimierz.
Iwona finds a score, and Justice Knight begins to pick the strings with an arrowhead according to her master's instructions. Iwona begins to sing.
Twist your joints, Justice! Follow me lead!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Like this? Left, left, right, right, left, left, right, right—
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Hah! You look so silly!
attributes.name: Iwona
'Justice Knight'
attributes.content: Beep-Beep, analyzing expression—

attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'
attributes.content: Master is 100% happy. Justice Knight is happy too.
See? Singing doesn't do anything and playing the guitar doesn't do anything, but it's fun and happy to sing and dance together with you!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Sometimes, people do things that are pointless but fun. Sometimes it's an excuse to put something off. Sometimes it's just to pass the time. When that happens, all you need to do is leave them alone.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight understands now! It is like how master always plans to clobber the Armorless Union. It is pointless, but it is fun!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: That's not the same! Are you sure you get it...?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Understood, master! Please log prohibited items in Justice Knight's core program, so that I will not improperly interfere with other people's affairs.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight has already logged a prohibited item: Do not water Operator Flamebringer's flowers in the morning.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: By setting proper boundaries, Justice Knight will be able to provide better help to everyone!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Exactly! Problem solved! My pet is so smart!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Proud beeping)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: You. Justice Knight, Raythean operation platform. It was you, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Puzzle

attributes.content: 'A jigsaw puzzle is a recreation device made of paper. It loses its value when completed by someone else.'
Justice Knight makes a quick beeping exit.
'The skateboarding Operator is reaching for high-up objects as a form of self-challenge. There is no need to intervene.'
Justice Knight ascertains that the operator is safe, then makes a beeping exit.
Hi, Claire... you know, I heard the cafeteria vending machine has some new stuff in stock.
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: H—How about you and I, you know, go to lunch together...?
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: Gosh, what's that in your hand? Aww, are you finally going to say it?
attributes.name: Excited Operator

attributes.content: Wh—What? A rose? When? No, I, I'm not... I mean, yes, I—I am...
attributes.name: Shy Operator

attributes.content: 'Operator Ron is clearly romantically interested in Operator Claire. Do not interrupt him while he attempts to ask her out on a date.'
Justice Knight shares off a few rose petals and rolls away with her beeps.
Looks like Justice finally gets it! Clever girl.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Whoosh! A rubber arrow knocks the water bottle over, pouring just the right amount of water into the flowerbed.
Good evening, Operator Flamebringer! Your flowers are beautiful as ever!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Flamebringer's gaze moves back and forth between the flowers and the operation platform in front of him.
Beep-Beep, analyzing expression—you are currently feeling 50% confusion and 50% anxiety.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Data indicates that flower health has improved by 5% since Justice Knight took over. Leave it to Justice Knight!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Beep-Beep—your frustration level has risen by 10%?!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: I thought I said...
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: 'Don't come to water the flowers in the morning.' Of course! Justice Knight has logged your words, exactly as you spoke them.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Justice Knight is adhering to all prohibited items on record.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: However, the time now is not morning, but evening, which is the second-most appropriate time to water flowers in the day. Therefore, from now on, Justice Knight will come in the evening—
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Beep-Beep—you are no longer feeling confusion. Justice Knight will now continue to...
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: W—Wait, your anger level is rising rapidly!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Please, put down your weapon—anger is bad for your health—Justice Knight will play guitar and dance for you, in order to improve your happiness—
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'
